ygData.subject: Re: An idea for one of our missing song slots
ygData.msgSnippet: I m new to this discussion, and obviously to the bard (havent even picked my name yet, any suggestion?) The button mash is one factor which made me decide to
ygData.messageBody:
I'm new to this discussion, and obviously to the bard (havent even
picked my name yet, any suggestion?)
The button mash is one factor which made me decide to make a cleric a
while ago when i started him... I think its silly... The suggestion to
just make songs a little better, but un "stackable" makes a lot of
sense. But it aint going to happen...

As for marketing depts overriding the programmers, what better example
is there than the MERP (middle earth) online game. The programmers were
trying to break new ground with that one, but th emarketing people
thought it wouldnt sell. Permanent Death was the first "feature" to get
the axe...
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
